hotel_name: Terres de France - Résidence Côté Provence
hotel_description:
Featuring a seasonal outdoor pool, Terres de France - Résidence Côté Provence in Gréoux-les-Bains offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking for guests who drive.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. A dishwasher, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

A outdoor play equipment is also available at the holiday park, while guests can also relax in the garden.

ITER / Cadarache is 19 km from Terres de France - Résidence Côté Provence, while Golf du Luberon is 23 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 90 km from the accommodation.

The Lou Paradou hotel is located in Greoux-les-Bains, by the Verdon River, next to the lavender fields in the heart of the Provence. It is set within a large park and offers a heated, seasonal and heated outdoor pool.

The Lou Paradou offers air-conditioned studios equipped with a kitchenette, free Wi-Fi access in the rooms and a private balcony or terrace. Some studios have a view of the park and air conditioning.

A breakfast serving jams and fruit syrups both homemade is offered. The hotel is just 400 metres from Greoux village pedestrian centre and there is free on-site parking.

Guests can visit the Verdon Gorge, the largest canyon in Europe, the Luberon villages and Haute-Provence hilltop villages. Local leisure activities around Gréoux include hiking, mountain-bike, white-water sports, gliding and rock climbing.

Marseille Provence Airport is situated 80 km from the Hotel and Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station is 70 km away.

hotel_name: Le gite du grand cèdre - proche des gorges du Verdon
hotel_description:
Le gite du grand cèdre - proche des gorges du Verdon, a property with barbecue facilities, is situated in Allemagne-en-Provence, 29 km from ITER / Cadarache, 34 km from Golf du Luberon, as well as 44 km from Digne Golf Course. This property offers access to a patio, free private parking and free WiFi.

The holiday home with a terrace and garden views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a shower.

Guests at the holiday home can enjoy hiking nearby, or make the most of the garden.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 101 km from Le gite du grand cèdre - proche des gorges du Verdon.

Located in Gréoux-les-Bains, between the Gorges du Verdon and the Luberon, the Villa Borghese is situated in a park surrounded by 100-year old oak trees. It features a heated outdoor swimming pool with a terrace and a wellness centre.

The intimate rooms feature garden views, air conditioning and a TV with satellite channels. The en suite bathroom is equipped with a bath tub and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

The on-site gastronomic restaurant, La Table de Pauline, serves breakfast each morning as well as Provençal cuisine which has been recommended in travel and restaurant guide books. For a relaxed midday meal guests can eat at the Côté Jardin.

A tennis court and sauna are also available on site. Villa Borghese is 14 km from the A51 motorway and 16 km from Manosque. The Aix-en-Provence TGV station is 70 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

Résidence Les Écureuils has garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, situated in Gréoux-les-Bains, 19 km from ITER / Cadarache.

A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available in the kitchen, as well as a coffee machine.

The apartment offers a seasonal outdoor pool.

Guests at Résidence Les Écureuils can enjoy cycling and fishing nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace.

Golf du Luberon is 23 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 81 km from Résidence Les Écureuils.

hotel_name: La Bastide du Calalou; BW Signature Collection
hotel_description:
Bastide Du Calalou is located a 30-minute drive from the Gorges du Verdon and a 20-minute drive from the Sainte-Croix Lake. It features a heated, outdoor swimming pool, a tennis court and elegant guestrooms that overlook the Aups Valley.

Rooms at Bastide Du Calalou are equipped with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms also have a DVD and video player.

A full breakfast buffet is served daily and Bastide’s restaurant serves regional cuisine, prepared with local produce. Guests can enjoy lunch and dinner in the restaurant or on the terrace.

Bastide Du Calalou is close to the village of Tourtour and the black truffle market, which is the third largest in France and open from December to April.

Located in the heart of an olive grove, 800m from the village of Moustiers, La Clorinde is ideally situated to discover the Gorges du Verdon (1.5Km) and to appreciate the beauty of the lake of Sainte Croix (3Km) and the lavender fields.

The large, bright, quiet, air-conditioned rooms have a view on the garden and the mountains.

Breakfast (3 formulas), dinner, prepared with local products, will be served on the terrace and will make you appreciate the charms of the Provencal gastronomy.

We propose you, free of charge, a parking and a very powerful Wifi access. A laundry service is also available.

We speak 3 languages: French, English, Spanish

All your requests are welcome. La Clorinde, a haven of peace, will do everything possible to make your stay in Provence an unforgettable experience.

Set in a 2-hectare park in the Verdon Regional Nature Park, Hôtel Restaurant L'Ermitage features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, 3 terraces, a bar, a restaurant and panoramic views of the mountain.

The rooms at Hôtel Restaurant L'Ermitage feature a balcony, en suite facilities with bath, free toiletries and a hairdryer, and a flat-screen TV. They also offer views of the pool. Some rooms have air conditioning.

Breakfast, lunch and dinner can be reserved upon arrival. The restaurant serves local and traditional cuisine, and the bar offers a wide range of cocktails all year long.

Hôtel Restaurant L'Ermitage is 5 km from the Verdon Gorge and the Lake of Sainte Croix is 800 metres away.  Nearby outdoor activities include hiking, swimming in the Lake, paragliding and canyoning. Free parking and free WiFi are available on site.

Offering a sun terrace and views of the mountain, Auberge Verdon is a B&B situated in La Palud in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur Region, 90 km from Fréjus, at the beginning of the Route des Crètes. Free private parking is available on site.

Rooms have a private bathroom equipped with a shower.

There is a shared lounge at the property.

Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including cycling and hiking. Grasse is 89 km from AUBERGE VERDON, while Gréoux-les-Bains is 58 km away. The nearest airport is Côte d'Azur Airport, 110 km from the property.

Maison Castellane Chambre d'Hotes B&B is set 700 metres from the centre of Castellane. Guests can enjoy the terrace and garden. Free private parking is available on site.

Some rooms have a seating area where you can relax. All rooms include views of the mountain or garden. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Maison Castellane Chambre d'Hotes B&B features free WiFi.

The Gorges du Verdon are 32 km away from Maison Castellane Chambre d'Hotes B&B, while Entrevaux is 41 km away. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 85 km from the property.

Set in La Palud sur Verdon, Ferme de Bourras features accommodation with free WiFi and seating area.

Opening to a terrace with mountain views, all units are fitted with a kitchen with a toaster and a fridge. A stovetop is also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

The camping offers a barbecue.

Cycling can be enjoyed nearby.

Verdon Gorge is 7 km from Ferme de Bourras. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 108 km from the accommodation.

This campsite is set on the river bank, located in the village of Castellane, within a 5-minute drive of the Verdon Gorge. Free WiFi is provided in public areas and the property has a table tennis table as well as a boules pitch.

A TV with cable channels and a private terrace feature in all the chalets and mobile homes, which have a simple décor with wooden furnishings. The en suite bathrooms are fitted with a shower. Located at the edge of the forest, all accommodation types offer mountain views.

Guests can enjoy a variety of relaxing massages onsite and upon request.

A microwave, fridge and hotplates are included in each kitchenette at Camping La Ferme de Castellane. There are barbecue facilities at the property.  The property has a heated swimming pool as well as unusual accommodation.

Additional services include a laundrette and there is a children’s playground. You can watch Canal+ channels in the TV room, which also has a library or play table football and board games.

The centre of Castellane is 2.3 km from the campsite and the city of Grasse is 65 km away. It is the starting point of the GR4 hiking path and there is a free, private parking available on site.

Unlimited coffee, tea and hot chocolate is served in the morning.

Situated in an 18th-century building, Le Vieux Château features rooms with an LCD TV and free Wi-Fi, a bar and a terrace. Set in the centre of Aiguines, it opens on a Provençal-style square with bars and shops.

With views of the village, all of the rooms include a private bathroom with hairdryer, shower and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is served every morning. You can also enjoy an ice cream at the bar or try one of the Provençal specialties proposed at the hotel’s restaurant.

You can go sailing on the Sainte Croix Lake, which is 8 km away, or visit the Museum of Prehistory in Quinson, a 40-minute drive away. Le Vieux Château is accessible via the A51 motorway.

hotel_name: Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence
hotel_description:
Located 500 metres from the village and 800 metres from the thermal baths,Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence consists of 3 small complexes. It includes 3 swimming pools and relaxation facilities.

The apartments at Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence are equipped with a kitchenette including hotplates, a microwave, an oven, and a dishwasher.

The apartments situated on the ground floor boast a private garden and all others feature their own terrace.

Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence boasts 2 outdoor swimming pools and 1 indoor swimming pool. Sports-enthusiasts will appreciate the residence’s fitness centre.

You can also enjoy unwinding in the spa with its hot tub, hammam and sauna.

This camping site is situated in the heart of the Verdon Gorges, at an altitude of 765 metres and just 2 km from Castellane. Camping Calme et Nature boasts a barbecue and sun terrace. The property is set in the Verdon Natural Regional Park. Free WiFi is available.

All units feature a seating and dining area. There is a kitchenette, fitted with a microwave and refrigerator. A stovetop and coffee machine are also available. Each unit comes with a private bathroom with a shower.

Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar and play table tennis at the property. Free use of bicycles is available. Guests can access the village of Castellane via the GR4 hiking trail, by foot or by bike.

Grasse is 66 km from Camping Calme et Nature, while Gréoux-les-Bains is 77 km away. The nearest airport is Côte d'Azur Airport, 86 km from Calme et Nature.

Situated in Gréoux-les-Bains, 18 km from ITER / Cadarache and 22 km from Golf du Luberon, Studio Lou Cigaloun features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with a shower.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 89 km from the apartment.

Located in Castellane, in the Verdon Regional Nature Park, Hotel du Levant features a restaurant and terrasse and free WiFi access in public areas. A secured garage is also available for guest at an extra cost.

All rooms at Hotel du Levant features a flat-screen TV, a desk and a wardrobe and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Daily cleaning is made at the property and towels and toiletries are provided for free.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the restaurant. The hotel’s restaurant serves French cuisine.

Hotel du Levant is 6.2 km from Lac de Castillon, 65 km from Grasse and 82 km from Cannes.

Boasting garden views, La Maison du Courtil, Amande-Olive offers accommodation with a balcony and a coffee machine, around 41 km from Digne Golf Course. Featuring a patio, the apartment is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as fishing, hiking and tennis.

The apartment with a terrace and mountain views has 3 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 3 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 123 km from the apartment.

Bienvenue chez nous is set in Saint-Martin-de-Brômes, 26 km from ITER / Cadarache, 30 km from Golf du Luberon, as well as 47 km from Digne Golf Course. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi.

The apartment is located on the ground floor and is fitted with 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with streaming services and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, a microwave, a washing machine, a toaster and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 98 km from the apartment.

hotel_name: "Les Lauriers" chambre d'hôtes indépendante avec terrasse
hotel_description:
Chambre D'Hôtes "Les Lauriers" chambre d'hôtes indépendante avec terrasse offers accommodation in Moustiers-Sainte-Marie.

Each room has a flat-screen TV. You will find a kettle in the room. Rooms have a private bathroom.

Gréoux-les-Bains is 28 km from Chambre D'Hôtes "Les Lauriers" chambre d'hôtes indépendante avec terrasse, while Manosque is 35 km from the property. The nearest airport is Côte d'Azur Airport, 82 km from the property.

hotel_name: Magnifique Duplex spacieux 50 M2 Classé 3 étoiles sans vis-à-vis
hotel_description:
Situated in Gréoux-les-Bains, 18 km from ITER / Cadarache and 23 km from Golf du Luberon, Magnifique Duplex spacieux 50 M2 Classé 3 étoiles sans vis-à-vis offers a garden and air conditioning. This apartment features free private parking, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi.

The apartment with a terrace and garden views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

The apartment offers a barbecue. If you would like to discover the area, walking tours is possible in the surroundings.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 80 km from Magnifique Duplex spacieux 50 M2 Classé 3 étoiles sans vis-à-vis.

Set in the Verdon Regional Nature Park, a 1-minute walk from the Verdon River and 5 km from Castillon Lake, Ma petite Auberge offers a traditional restaurant, a garden and a terrace.  A public swimming pool is located 100 metres from the property.

The heated rooms offer a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathroom is fitted with a bath or a shower and includes free toiletries.  Some offer a view of the terrace and the village’s place.

A continental breakfast is available every morning, and you can enjoy lunch and dinner in the park beside the 100-year-old Tilia Tree. Grocers can be found within 1 km.

It is 40 km from Dignes Train Station. Grasse is located 65 km from Ma Petite Auberge, while Cannes is 82 km away. A free, private car park is available on site.

Located in Montagnac in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region and ITER / Cadarache reachable within 37 km, Camping Arbre de Vie provides accommodation with free WiFi, barbecue facilities, a garden and free private parking.

All units come with a terrace with garden views, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a shared bathroom with walk-in shower. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

Guests at the luxury tent can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Camping Arbre de Vie offers a picnic area.

There is a shared lounge at this property and guests can go cycling and fishing nearby.

Golf du Luberon is 41 km from the accommodation, while Digne Golf Course is 45 km away. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres, 105 km from Camping Arbre de Vie, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

The Château de Taulane is a 4-star hotel located 20 km from the Verdon Gorge in stunning surroundings with a 18-hole golf course. It offers elegant rooms and excellent facilities and Grasse is 40 km away.

The rooms are located inside this 18th century château and also in the manor house. They are tastefully decorated in traditional Provençal style. Bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries are provided for guests' comfort.

The on-site restaurant  offers quality cuisine prepared by a top chef. There is also a bar and a range of premium hotel services available for guests.

Guests have free access to the swimming pool, sauna, spa and hot tub.

Castellane is a 20-minute drive away and Draguignan is 50 km away. Free parking is available.

The Nouvel Hôtel du Commerce is located in Castellane, in the Verdon region. It offers a heated swimming pool from mid-May to September, comfortable rooms in 2 buildings and free, closed private parking.

Some rooms offer views of the pool, of the mountain or of the city. They are all complete with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and there is also access to a bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer.

Every morning, a breakfast buffet featuring a range of local and homemade products is served. It can be enjoyed by the pool or in the common dining room.

For your comfort, the hotel provides free Wi-Fi in all the rooms. The area offers many activities such museums and excursions.

The hotel provides a free storage for bikes.
hotel_description

Located in Montagnac in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region, Loft avec mezzanine has a patio. The air-conditioned accommodation is 38 km from ITER / Cadarache, and guests benefit from complimentary WiFi and private parking available on site.

The apartment with a terrace and garden views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Guests at the apartment can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Loft avec mezzanine offers a picnic area. Guests can also relax in the garden.

Golf du Luberon is 42 km from the accommodation, while Digne Golf Course is 45 km away. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 105 km from Loft avec mezzanine.

Situated within the Verdon National Park, Logis de la Rose is in the centre of Greoux-les-Bains and just 800 metres from thermal baths. The hotel dates from the 16th century and provides accommodation with lift access. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property.

The rooms at Logis de la Rose are simply decorated. All rooms have cable TV and some rooms have a balcony.

Breakfast is served every morning at the hotel. A set evening meal can be enjoyed upon request at the property.

Esparron Lake is 10 km from the hotel. Manosque is 15.5 km away.

Set in a garden just 300 metres from Castellane, Chambres d’Hôtes Aqui Sian Ben features a terrace with mountain views and luggage storage. Verdon River is 600 metres from the property.

Decorated in neutral colours, all rooms offer a flat-screen TV, safety deposit box and free Wi-Fi access, while some feature a balcony and mountain views. They are complete with en suite bathroom.

Breakfast is provided and serves homemade products such as jam, yoghurt and bread. The property is ideally located a 5-minute walk from shops and restaurants.

Castillon Lake is 15 km from the B&B and guests can find canoeing and rafting activities 1.6 km away. Saint-André-les-Alpes Train Station is 20 km away and free private parking is available on site. There is also a garage for bikes and motorcycles.

hotel_name: Club Vacances Bleues Domaine de Château Laval
hotel_description:
Club Vacances Bleues Domaine de Château Laval is located in the thermal resort of Gréoux-les-Bains, between the Luberon Natural Regional Park and the Verdon Gorges and 58 km from Aix-en-Provence. The 3-star resort features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, an indoor pool, 3 tennis courts, free WiFi access and a 24-hour reception.

All guest rooms in the resort are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Guests can also stay in Mobile Homes which each have a kitchenette and dining area. Free WiFi is provided in each room and mobil home.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at the property. Guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant, which serves a variety of French and Provencal dishes.

Other onsite facilities include a children's playground, an educational farm and a volleyball court. Tree climbing tracks and horse riding lessons are available on site. The area is popular for hiking and cycling.

A free shuttle service to the thermals baths is available from Monday to Sunday. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 82 km from Club Vacances Bleues Domaine de Château Laval.

Featuring accommodation with a pool with a view, Mazet Lavande is situated in Saint-Martin-de-Brômes. Boasting free private parking, the holiday home is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as skiing and cycling.

The holiday home has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with mountain views.

ITER / Cadarache is 26 km from the holiday home, while Golf du Luberon is 30 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 97 km from Mazet Lavande.

Located in Gréoux-les-Bains, Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region, Le Chemin Neuf is set 22 km from Golf du Luberon. With free WiFi, this 1-star hotel has a terrace and a restaurant. The property is non-smoking and is situated 18 km from ITER / Cadarache.

At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a wardrobe.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 89 km from Le Chemin Neuf.

Offering garden views, Verdon Secret - L'escapade parfaite is an accommodation set in Gréoux-les-Bains, 18 km from ITER / Cadarache and 22 km from Golf du Luberon. It features mountain views and free WiFithroughout the property.

The 2-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave, and 1 bathroom with shower.

If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 89 km from the apartment.

hotel_name: " LE CHABASSOLE " CHAMBRES D'HÔTES - Massages - Jacuzzi - Sauna - GORGES DU VERDON
hotel_description:
Offering an outdoor pool, Le Chabassole B&B is located in the heart of the Regional Park of Verdon just 300 metres from the shore of Sainte Croix Lake, 4 km from Les Salles-sur-Verdon and 6 km from Aiguines. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property.

The rooms here will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and a terrace. The private bathrooms come with a bath or shower and a toilet. You can enjoy garden views from the rooms. Extras include outdoor furniture and linen made with organic cotton.

At Le Chabassole you will find a garden. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including horse riding, cycling, hiking and water sports.

The property offers a pétanque field. Free parking is available on site.

With garden views, Le Clos de Barbey is located in Bauduen and has a restaurant and a kids' club.

Fitted with a terrace, the units feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured in the kitchen, as well as a coffee machine.

The campground offers a children's playground.

In addition to a seasonal outdoor pool, Le Clos de Barbey also provides a kids pool.

Saint-Endréol Golf Club is 48 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 108 km from Le Clos de Barbey.

Set in Castellane, 19 km from Château de Taulane Golf Course, Le long du Verdon offers accommodation with pool with a view, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a barbecue. Guests can enjoy pool views.

All guest rooms in the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms have a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, while selected rooms also offer a kitchen fitted with a dishwasher. At Le long du Verdon each room comes with bed linen and towels.

The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 85 km from the accommodation.

Set in Riez, 35 km from ITER / Cadarache, Bastide De Mazan offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. The property is non-smoking and is situated 37 km from Digne Golf Course.

The units in the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Featuring a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, rooms at Bastide De Mazan also have free WiFi, while selected rooms here will provide you with a terrace. At the accommodation all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

At Bastide De Mazan guests are welcome to take advantage of a solarium.

Golf du Luberon is 39 km from the guest house. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 107 km from Bastide De Mazan.

Entre Ciel et Verdon has mountain views, free WiFi and free private parking, set in Castellane, 14 km from Château de Taulane Golf Course.

Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

The apartment offers a sun terrace.

The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 79 km from Entre Ciel et Verdon.

Located in the centre of the Castellane Village, this hotel is 100 meters from the Verdon River and Gorges. Canoeing, rafting and hiking are some of the activities that can be done in the surrounding area.

 With a village or mountains view, each room at Hôtel du Roc is equipped with an LCD TV and a bathroom with shower, toilet and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is served daily and a traditional restaurant is also at your disposal on site.

Saint Andrée les Alpes Train Station is 25 km away and Moustiers Sainte Marie is 45 km away.

Offering an outdoor pool and panoramic views of Sainte-Croix Lake, Les Cavalets is located in Bauduen. Free WiFi access is available in public areas.

Some rooms have a balcony or a terrace and offer lake views. The private bathrooms come with a bath or shower.

At Les Cavalets you will find a garden and a bar. Guests can enjoy traditional Provençal meals from the hotel’s restaurant. Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities and a shared lounge.

An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling and canoeing. The property offers free parking.

The hotel is 2 km from Sainte Croix Lake. Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 126 km away.

hotel_name: Camping RCN Les Collines de Castellane
hotel_description:
Camping Les Collines de Castellane is 20 km from Lac de Castillon and 6.5 km from Castellane, the gateway to the Gorges du Verdon region. It offers a seasonal outdoor swimming pool with slides and massage jets, a restaurant, a pizzeria and a snack bar.

The mobile homes, chalets and luxury tents at Les Collines have an equipped kitchen, a bathroom with a shower and bedrooms equipped with pillows and covers. Each unit has a furnished terrace.

Guests can play boules, basketball, football and volleyball at Camping Les Collines de Castellane, and there are outdoor fitness facilities. For an extra fee, guests can experience the on site Adventure Park and Zip line, or play tennis.

The area is popular for rafting, canyoning and horse riding.

hotel_name: Gaïa, maison d'hôtes Verdon, vue féerique
hotel_description:
Situated in Blieux, Gaïa, maison d'hôtes Verdon, BBQ facilities, and free WiFi. With a garden, the property also features a terrace. The guest house provides a shared lounge.

The House come with a dishwasher, oven, a coffee machine, a bath, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The House has a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge.

A continental breakfast is served each morning at the property.

The area is popular hiking and cycling,

La Foux is 49 km from Gaïa, maison d'hôtes Verdon, vue féerique. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 72 km from the property.

Featuring mountain views, Gîte LA BOUSCARLE provides accommodation with a terrace and a coffee machine, around 41 km from ITER / Cadarache. The holiday home has access to a restaurant and free WiFithroughout the property.

The holiday home is equipped with 4 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are provided in the holiday home.

After a day of cycling or hiking, guests can relax in the shared lounge area.

Saint-Endréol Golf Club is 44 km from the holiday home, while Barbaroux Golf Course is 50 km away. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 101 km from Gîte LA BOUSCARLE.

Located in Montagnac, 17 km from Gréoux-les-Bains, Le Jasmin is an air-conditioned Bed & Breakfast featuring free WiFi access and free private parking.

The rooms have a flat-screen TV. All rooms have a private bathroom.

Manosque is 26 km from Le Jasmin, while Moustiers-Sainte-Marie is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 76 km from the property.

Located 9 km from Bauduen and 24 km from Moustiers-Sainte-Marie, in southeastern France, this B&B offers an outdoor swimming pool with sun beds, a garden with terrace and an on-site bar. Lac de Sainte-Croix and the Gorges du Verdon are a short drive away.

The guest rooms at Domaine de Majastre include a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries, a radio and a telephone. All rooms have flat-screen TV with cable channels and free WiFi access. Bed linen and towels are provided.

A continental breakfast featuring a selection of pastries, homemade jams and fruits is provided daily.

Le Domaine de Majastre has a restaurant on site and offers refined local cuisine, all dishes are made from products from their farms, and certified organic.

Free, private parking is available on site. Several hiking and cycling trails leave from the property, and Arc-sur-Argens Train Station is 30 km away.

hotel_name: Studio au cœur du village provençale de Riez. Dans le Verdon.
hotel_description:
Located in Riez, Studio au cœur du village provençale de Riez. Dans le Verdon. Provides accommodation 37 km from ITER / Cadarache and 35 km from Digne Golf Course.

The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower while the kitchen features an oven, a microwave and a fridge. A stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

Golf du Luberon is 42 km from the apartment. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 109 km from Studio au cœur du village provençale de Riez. Dans le Verdon..

Just 850 metres from the Lake of Sainte-Croix, Mas des Grives features self-catering accommodation sitting in a garden. It is just 4 km from Bauduen village and offers free Wi-Fi and free private parking.

With a terrace, the one-bedroom apartment features a living room with flat-screen TV and satellite channels and a sofa bed. The bathroom is fitted with a shower.

Guests have access to BBQ facilities and to a fully equipped kitchen with microwave, stove and oven. Bars and restaurants are to be found 1 km away.

Guests can drive 10 minutes to Aups or 20 minutes to visit Moustiers village. Water sports facilities are available in the Verdon Gorge, 13 km away. Draguignan Train Station is 38 km away.

Located in Gréoux-les-Bains, 18 km from ITER / Cadarache, Villa Castellane provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can make use of a bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room has a kettle, while selected rooms are fitted with a kitchenette with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. At Villa Castellane every room has bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options.

The accommodation offers a terrace. Guests at Villa Castellane will be able to enjoy activities in and around Gréoux-les-Bains, like hiking and cycling.

Golf du Luberon is 22 km from the hotel. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 90 km from Villa Castellane.

hotel_name: Studio tout confort - Climatisation, parking, wifi
hotel_description:
Set in Gréoux-les-Bains, 19 km from ITER / Cadarache and 23 km from Golf du Luberon, Studio tout confort - Climatisation, parking, wifi offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 91 km from the apartment.

Set in Montagnac, 37 km from Digne-les-Bains, Gorges du Verdon - Lac Sainte-Croix offers a garden and free WiFi.

The holiday home provides guests with a patio, garden views, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. An oven, a stovetop and toaster are also offered, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine.

Guests at Gorges du Verdon - Lac Sainte-Croix can enjoy a continental or a Full English/Irish breakfast.

There is a barbecue and a sun terrace at this property and guests can go fishing nearby.

Moustiers-Sainte-Marie is 12 km from the accommodation, while Manosque is 27 km from the property. The nearest airport is La Mole Airport, 70 km from Gorges du Verdon - Lac Sainte-Croix.

hotel_name: La Bastide du Calalou; BW Signature Collection
hotel_description:
Bastide Du Calalou is located a 30-minute drive from the Gorges du Verdon and a 20-minute drive from the Sainte-Croix Lake. It features a heated, outdoor swimming pool, a tennis court and elegant guestrooms that overlook the Aups Valley.

Rooms at Bastide Du Calalou are equipped with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms also have a DVD and video player.

A full breakfast buffet is served daily and Bastide’s restaurant serves regional cuisine, prepared with local produce. Guests can enjoy lunch and dinner in the restaurant or on the terrace.

Bastide Du Calalou is close to the village of Tourtour and the black truffle market, which is the third largest in France and open from December to April.
